snippet: Kevin Millwood pitched six no-hit innings before leaving with a groin injury, and a bevy of Seattle relievers continued to hold the Dodgers in check for the victory.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Millwood pitched six no-hit innings before leaving with a groin injury, and a bevy of Seattle relievers continued to hold the Dodgers in check for the victory.

headline.seo: Mariners’ Scramble Yields a No-Hitter by Committee
headline.main: Mariners’ Scramble Yields a No-Hitter by Committee
headline.print_headline: Mariners’ Scramble Yields a No-Hitter by Committee
